md:
giải nghĩa từ "evaluate" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Evaluate (verb) - Đánh giá, thẩm định

* Evaluate something: to judge or calculate the quality, importance, or amount of something
* Evaluate someone: to judge someone's performance, abilities, or character

Example sentences:

* The teacher will evaluate the students' essays based on their grammar and content.
* The company will evaluate the employee's performance before deciding on a promotion.

Related words:

* Assessment
* Appraisal
* Review
* Analysis

Antonyms:

* Ignore
* Disregard
* Overlook

Note: Evaluate can also be used as a noun, meaning the act of evaluating or judging something.

Evaluate (noun) - Đánh giá, thẩm định

* The evaluation of the new policy will take several weeks.

In this case, the antonyms would be:

* Approval
* Endorsement
* Acceptance
